title: Canada
desc:
Post 1118
- While you own this, you mjst always be polite to the next player in the turn order. In return, said player must take one of your cards once every two turns.
- While you own this, you are extremely passive, you cannot play attack cards that cause players to draw more than 2 cards. The next player in the player order also enherits this effect. The passiveness spreads.
